Title: Docchi mo Maid
Description: ["Izumi, a 12-year-old schoolgirl, suddenly gets not one but two lovely and rather lewd maids from outer space, who have to defend her city from a monster's invasion."]
Staff: [['Ishikawa, Naoya', 'Director, Script, Theme Song Lyrics'], ['Okajima, Tae', 'Theme Song Performance'], ['Kurage, Kozue', 'Theme Song Performance'], ['Morita, Shunsuke', 'Theme Song Composition']]
